data.eml:eml: Redescription and new records of Ontholestes brasilianus Bernhauer, 1906 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa-Silva, Vinícius, Asenjo, Angélico, Newton, Alfred F., Thyssen, Patricia J. (2018): Redescription and new records of Ontholestes brasilianus Bernhauer, 1906 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylininae). Zootaxa 4388 (1): 143-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4388.1.12
